name: Summer Camp Vibes - Teenage Romance Story (lisaweby)
name_original: Summer Camp Vibes - Teenage Romance Story (lisaweby)
description:
Summer’s finally here! Summer break can begin! Get ready for one of the best summer camp games for girls. Summer camp is the best place to get to know your crush and make new friends. Experience a breathtaking summer romance a love adventure full of unexpected events.

You choose your own path and determine your own destiny. Do it wisely, sometimes making the right choice and expressing true feelings can be really challenging. Be a part of mesmerizing interactive love romance story games that need no wifi, explore the remarkable love romance story games for teenage girls, and be ready for stunning love twists and turns. 

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.summercamp.vibes.teenageromanc...

Download on AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/summer-camp-teenage-story/id1458355214
